mapper.select: select * from comment where j_idx=#{ j_idx } order by idx desc
select * from ( select rank() over(order by idx desc) no, c.* from ( select * from comment where j_idx=#{ j_idx } ) c ) where no between #{ start } and #{ end }
select nvl(count(*),0) from comment where j_idx=#{ j_idx }
mapper.insert: insert into comment(c_comment, c_ip, c_regdate, j_idx, m_idx) values( #{c_comment}, #{c_ip}, now(), #{j_idx}, #{m_idx} )
mapper.delete: delete from comment where c_idx=#{ c_idx }
